values:
haven't written in hear for ages...but i just didnt feel like it. so...

since last thursday school's out but NOT for ever *aaaaaaaaaaah*. I defenitely dont like the fact of going to school  for another stupid year! Why the hell does Germany have that 13 year school thing, huh?
The worst part of that is, that most of my friends will be gone after the summer...
thats why me and 5 of my friends are going on a 5 or 6 days trip to holland! *harhar* 
august the 3rd it THE day ...:) ... well and right after that im going to hungary with David, my bf.
There will be a huuuuge festival (called sziget) from the 10th. up to the 17th.
well... as cool that all will be... afterwards there wont be ANY money left on my account. :/
but oh well....

so much for now.

its such a shame...whenever i realize how often anyone else writes in here ...and then... well.. then i think of me as the laziest bum ever...:/
and evertime i really really try to write more often... but it just seems like i CANNOT!!!... dont ask why...
well... lots of things happened ... 
i had like billions of stupid fights with my mom... what is just horrible... because i hate arguing with her... but that seems to be a part of our both life...we just cant change... it really goes on my nerves... but in a very bad, hurting, distroying way... but enough of that.

last friday i went ...once again *lol* ... to a show of my "favourite" LOCAL band... for anyone who doesnt know of whom im talkin about... SIXIE & FUCHS... all right... well... it was quite awesome... not the best show ever... it was way too short... but still pretty good. afterwards a friend and i had quite a good talk with some of the guys of the band...

....

the last days... i was thinking a lot of the good days i had last year living in West Virginia.... i really miss my friends over there :( ...and that stupid time-difference really  does NOT help... man... 6 hours is a lot... thats at least what i think.  :/
all right... i gtg now... 

and you know... i TRY MY BEST!!!

hello again.
im still alive...even though i cant really blieve it... all that snow thats coming down....well...not that i dont like snow... BUT i dont have the chance to go snowboarding... so.... why should there be snow... im just freezing to death, my nose is soon going to RUN AWAY(haha), and im late for school every single morning... just because i cant ride on my bike as fast as i would have to...so.... the snow is really annoying... i have to shove several times a day... and i cannot say that that is my favorite kind of wasting my time...hmmm...
well...
one of my friends (jakob) told me about his theory that it is going to be the slow but serious beginning of a nex ice age!!! what a horrible thought... i cant wait for summer... of at least spring.... actually... summer can be pretty bad as well... with all that sweating as soon as you move just an inch to much... well.... every seasons has its pros and cons, right?!

well.. if you wonder by now why im just writing about stupid weather conditions... haha.... thats just because i dont know what else to write about... nothing really changed... im hanging out with my friends, going to local band concerts , getting bruises caused by dancing(hihi) all over, and school keeps me buzy like always....


so much for now...

until we "see" each other again...bye ;)

PS: HOLLY(!!!) if you schould read that.... HOW ARE YOU DOING?!!! STILL ALIVE?!!!

hello everybody!

here i am... standin in the new year of 2005. .... well.. and nothing really changed. so... what to write about? 
the last two days i just felt like im sitting next to myself....i other words... i was totally beat. a reason might be... that i just didnt get enough rest throughout the last weekS and my body decidet to slow down in the new year.... oh well... but now im back and alive after 2 days of just being lazy at home, watching stupid movies, playing the guitar(yeah, im really really bad at it*giggle*) and eatin.

friends of mine and myself(of course) had a little party at a friends house. to keep it short:
lots of fun, music, food, and alcohol. at around 11.30pm  we walked down into the city, where there was some kind of a huge new years party with horrible music on the center plaza. well... it was still fun though.

...

i decided not to have any new year's resolutions just because you always say something like "i dont wanna eat as much candy anymore" or "studying more for school" or what ever... but are you actually doing it? NO. so... why should i make up some weird resolution im not going to do anyways?! waste of time.

happy new year to everyone.

wow... its defenitely been a while since i wrote in here the last time....im ashamed....   -.-
well.... better later than never, right? so.... here i am again.
its the last day of school... so thats defenitely a reason to cheere me up... *yay*. 

hmmm...do you know that hectical feeling whenever you realize that christmas is just rushing up and you still dont have the presents for family and friends...!!! well...if yes....you know exactly how i feel right now.
oh well... ill hope for the best and go shoping today.
i dont know if i wrote that in here already or not... i got my driver's licence(more than a  month ago... and im still alive...).
the whole last week and this week as well are cold as hell. im seriously freezing my a** off....the good thing is the snow doesnt melt away and the chances to have a white christmas are pretty good. the bad thing about it.... im sick. sneezing, coughing, nose is running... well...but i guess thats somewhat normal. huh?!

what else is new...hmmm... 
a very special person stepped into my life and is just changing a lot of it... in a good way though....and works hard on breaking down all the walls i built up around my inside over the years. i dont know how he does it... but...oh well...

igtg now...
but ill write more often ...promise

i just watched the Moore Movie "Farenheit 9/11" on TV... man and i tell you... im in such a bad and angry mood right now. i just dont understand it. did you ever read the book "stupid white men" or see any of moores' movies? how can anyone vote for bush knowing what he has done or is going to do? its not like that movie just opened my eyes...but it just pushed me again to that specific point of anger. 
i know... thats not the best entrey i wrote in here... i just had to let that out real quick though...

i hope(!!!) that no one is voting for the wrong guy tomorrow!

sunny and only a few clouds....great :)
i just got up and ate some really delicious cereal *yummy*... oh well... i guess you dont care about that, huh?
im in an almost surprisingly good mood... the reason might be... that one week of fall break is laying ahead of me?! *yay*... time for doing a lot of...nothing :)
the last 2 weeks a had my first few big big tests...english, german(4hours of writing!!!), and yesterday...MATH...*aaah*... you cant even imagine how enthusiastic i was whenever that freakin math test was over! man...i realized... only 7 more tests in math (during my last 2 years of school) , one of them an graduation final exam, and never ever again any math.... *yay*... if that isnt reason enough to party? well... so i partied...:)all right....i dont know what else to write...hmmm

but hey... did u ever came up with some totally crazy story with your friends... and in the end no one knew how it all started out?.... well...ours was about a cat flying into a bonsai-tree!

it has been quite a while...i know... but hey... im so busy :)
another great weekend is over and before im off to bed i thought ... y dont u write in ur journal again, huh?!! so here i am.

i dont even know what to write about the last week(s). they were basically...normal weeks. besides the one change in my life. im no single female anymore. unbelievable... but i found my man :)... but im not going to talk about that more in here... only this... his name is David.
the weekends are always kinda the same... meeting my friends, going to parties, dancing/rocking like hell, ...just "sex, drugs, and rock'n'roll"... (ok... the part about the sex is not really true *lol*).
saturday night was great. a good friend of mine and i, we went to a band-pub-night... what means...about 22 bands were playing at 22 different locations/bars and you got to go  and see all of them after paying 10 bucks. it was lost of fun. at 12.00am we saw "sixie und fuchs" (the funk-rock band i told u about). and were dancing like we had to dance for our lifes :) i was so beat today...but not only cuz of the dancing i guess.
did u ever realize how much fun u can have driving up and down in a parking-deck?! *laugh*

so much for now...  i fear ill get seriously akward if i continue writing now.

nadin

summer is officially over! Not only that the nights are getting longer and longer again and it's already way too cold as soon as the sun is gone (not that it is really warm over the day...)...another fact just shouts the truth in my face...SUMMER IS OVER! 
School started last monday...i survived the first week. I have like the weirdest schedule and some very very horrible teachers.(or how would you call a math teacher who DOES NOT KNOW how to teach u anything or what book u actually need?!!)
and then is there the fact that i am not with all my friends anymore. For spending one year in wild, wonderful West Virgina i had to go back the 12th grade instead of being with all my friends(that are in 13th grade now...). And i dont know if it is just the fact that i never had too much contact with most of the students im in the same grade with right now... or if they are really just sooo different and absolutely weird... but the are so.... different. well... ill have to live with that.

i started taking guitar classes (again). and i just realized how much i actually missed it. (but hey JOHN!!!... its not quite as much fun as with having you as a "teacher" ^.^)

i could tell you more about school now, all the subjects i had to take... but i think... that would be just tyring you.

hmmm... the last two nights were lots of fun.... friday we drove to the next bigger town... were we went to a "private college student party bar" (stupid description)... it was great, already just for the fact that i met a lot of people again that graduated the last years... well... alright... also for the drinks *laugh*...i tell you "green fairy" is really really evil :)
and early this moring i came home from an awesome reaggeparty.
ok... enough for now. i dont want you to think im one of these girls that just keep on talking.

~nadin

isn't it kinda sad to realize that summer is over or getting close to that point? If u ask me..... i think it is... but it is not at the same time...weird, huh?!

next monday i'll have to actually get up EARLY, get on my good ol' bike and drive through the cold moring air...to school. once again "hello 12th grade". but this time in germany... not in the usa :( ...the same old same old daily scedule of life will grap and catch me. I will have to start studying again (after a whole year of doing almost nothing... pretty hard *lol*) and trying to listen to the teachers' talking while trying not to fall asleep.

and ... oh well.. i try not to get swallowed by the dangerous big feeling of beeing dissapointed and hurt ... 

so... at this place SOME facts that made my summer unique *laugh*...

graduating in WV ;)
the creamery and the best chunky chocolate ice cream
crusing around with holly *yay*...and stopping by at sheetz 
laying on the deck
bonnaroo
having to leave my new, second home :(
hanging out with all my old friends
rockin'
thousands of "homeparties"
behaving like little kids on a playground at 2.am :)
...

i really dont want do get on anyone's nerves... thats why im stopping here.

ok... i have to admit.. i just try to waste some time... because im sooo hungry but i have to wait at least 2 more hours till i get something to eat...why? you mean i could just walk up to the fridge?! ha! sad but true... we dont have one of these magical ones that are ALWAY FULL.. no. the other point is... im going out for dinner with a good friends. she's leaving soon. so thats a good reason for having a huge feast : ^.^

~nadin

Girl and guy were speeding over 100 mph on the road on a motorcycle...

Girl: Slow down. Im scared.
Guy: No this is fun.
Girl: No its not. Please, its too scary!
Guy: Then tell me you love me.
Girl: Fine, I love you. Slow down!
Guy: Now give me a BIG hug.
*Girl hugs him*
Guy: Can you take my helmet off & put it on yourself? Its bugging me.

(In the paper the next day):

A motorcycle had crashed into a building because of break failure. 2 people were on it, but only 1 survived. The truth was that halfway down the road, the guy realized that his breaks broke, but he didn't want to let the girl know. Instead, he had her say she loved him & felt her hug one last time, then had her wear his helmet so that she would live even though it meant that he would die.

if you love someone this much put it in your journal.

... *sigh*... im back
i spent the last week (better 9 days!) with my grandfather. what about that?! hes the most difficult, and nerve wrecking person i ever met. jesus christ... why does a person have to crytisize EVERYTHING he sees, make (mostly negative, discriminating) coments about EVERYTHING, not accept any other view of point than the own one, ... *aaaaaaah*... its just like... ok...nevermind. i could go on and on like that for pages now. but i might die of a heart attac as a cause.

the weather here is defenitely...SHIT. what doesnt really help to cheer my mood up. i dont really know why im such a bad bad mood... i havent had that for quite a while. there are probably several reasons.

first of that whole last week(of course...*lol*)... than the fact of realizing that nothing worked out the way i expected, being disabpointed in differnt ways by several things, and people(what is probably not only the persons's fault.. more the wrong expectations... i guess). everything seems pretty grey right now. maybe i should try to sleep and forget everything.. but damn it... im not tired...

ok.. i better stop now... u dont need my trashy thoughts.. right?

nadin

my moms birthday is coming up.. shes turning 50.. and thats probably the reason for her being so horribly grumpy and kinda anoyingly angry at anything... however.. cuz she doesnt want to celebrate or anything.. my dad had the great *argh* idea of going away for a few days... now we'll leave here sunday and come back wednesday... jesus... locked up with them again... IN THE MOUNTAINS!!! nothing agains my oldies... but after just being with them in mexico for 4 weeks... its getting almost too much... and after that ill be going right to my dear grandpa... (whos a pretty complicated *nice description* person...*hmmm*)... and ill be driving with him to the north sea for a week... y im doing that? on the one hand cuz im his only grandchild and havent done anything only with him for years...and also cuz its kinda like my "summerjob"!!!... yeah.. i'll have to do kinda what he wants, be nice to him and shit *sorry*...spent a week with him there... im like his... travelling guide and companion... so ill get payed also... what is defenitely cool... but also reasonable... if u would know my grandpa... u would agree w/ me in a second.

so... if u dont hear from me the next week(s) thats cuy im out with my family... *sigh*

~.
nadin

i love getting letters in the mail :) *hihi*.. no not the ones with bills... what r u thinking... im talkin about the ones someone wrote to u... and i got one today... and it totally cheered my whole day up... 
THANX HOLLY!!! :) ... i love every little thing about it... 

has anybody ever heard of "SPAWN"... its a comic...well... one of my crazy (no im not estimating...) gave a whole bunch of them to me... know im "reading" them... at first... i didnt like them too much... but now... jesus... im almost addicted... *yay*...

~.
nadin

wow... has been i while since my last entry... and now i have the shit right here... way to much to write down.. so ... where the hell to start?
it has been great...lol
all the time there's something going on around here...two weekend ago there was a festival i the next town... 48hours program non stop... and the best it was for free... so i would say... the perfect thing for someone who hast almost NO money but a big need to dance :) ... of course there were no famous or popular bands playing... at least none u would know... BUT.... they were great... they played all kinds of music... from alternative rock over reggae to ska and punk... everything was there :)
well... i still left a lot of money there...:)... beer isnt cheap (too bad *argh)
oh well... then last wednesday all my friends had there last day of school... finally... so we just HAD to celebrate that night :) ...
this weekend there was another festival right here in my little town. was there only one night though that was awesome... saturday one of my friend (uli) had her "good bye party"....cuz shes leaving for an exchange year(what kina sux... i come back, she leaves...)... but the bad thing is.. she doesnt even know yet, where and when shes going... so shes pretty nervous... 
if someone in the usa wants to take an exchange student... PLEASE go to asse and say u want her...lol

what else...hmmm i dont even remember... its like... my short term memory is dying or something ... :) ... if i say i had just a great time with my old friends, too much to drink, not enough to smoke (HOLLY, only twice since im BACK!!! i miss u....), not enough to sleep either, thousands of concerts i went etc. ... im defenitely not wrong :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

now.... i just read my dear friend holly+s journal... so thats mostly for her :)
its all right that u missed the call... there are gonna be a lot more night i'll be coming home buzzed :) ...*laugh*.
and maybe it sounds stupid for u guys if u read hear anger about the guitar purse... but if u ever had a special relationship with something its really special...... and that bag was so ...HOLLY... yeah... the best way to describe it.

to that betrayal thing i remember some quote...

"an insincere and evil friend is more to fear than a wild beast;
    a wild beast can wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your sould." [buddah]

i dont wanna say with that now that she is evil or so... it just came right into my mind ....*think*...............

r u sure though that u wanna send THE bag to me? its so yours... hang it on your wall... or something ... i dont wanna rip u guy apart!...(so i would treat and wear it with honor!)



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


oh my god... something else happend... i bought new shoes... i got them at ebay... NO they werent used...again they r chucks.. i just dont get away from them..... and they are... TOTALLY GREEN!!!! like everything!... no white rubber and shit :). i was so excited whenever i got them!
and only $ 26,00 

so... i gtg now... 

till the next time

~.
nadin

and another day passed... nothing really exciting happend... oh well.. i could finally sleep in!...and i needed all that sleep so much... i think parents cant... just canNOT see their children sleep whenever they have to get up... so they kinda woke me up almost every day the past week... *argh*... and i wouldnt say i went to bed very early... *lol*.
im back in germany now since LAST saturday... and everything gets back to 'normal'... in a way at least.
tomorrow our new sofa gets in... some friends daughter picked up our old one today.... :( i thought i would sit on it FOR EVER... but now its gone... and there is NO sofa right now... so HOW can i watch a movie tonight without being totally uncomfortabel....*laugh*... i have to say... i havent seen a movie for.... more than 1 1/2 months... and i dont miss it at all...*lol*... tv sux... but thats just my oppinion... kids should read more bookS!!! they r great... dont destroy their fantasy...

oh... yesterday my friends and i... we drove to the next town... on of our friends(patrick) and "his" band played at an open air event... but the to other bads that were playing werent good at all... the first one actually pretty bad... but oh well.. we didnt have to pay anything... so thats all right... but whenever one of the guys from the organisation kinda jelled at us... just because of bringing in our beer... that pissed me off... in a way...

ok... i gtg now...

~.
nadin

where to start... *think*... im back home not even for a week....and it seems like i never really left... but i guess thats a good thing... it would be awful to have akward silence between me and my friends... so... im glad about that.

today two huge packages i send off in the USA arrived... so the last 2 hours i spend unpacking and tried to put everything away... in my room what so ever... well...I TRIED!!!... and then another package arrived! HOLLY THANK U!!!!!! Yeah... i got the most awesome stuff in the whole world. for a while i got kinda sentimental unpacking everything... cuy it all reminded me to what i had to leave behind. :( ... but hey... i#ll go back... so ... no its almost noon... and im still in ma pajamas...i should get ready for the day... slowly...*aaah* i have to deliver newspapers for a friend... i totally forgot that... ok.. i really gtg.

~.
nadin

im so excited right now... im almost able to forget the 1000s of bug- and moscito bytes i have... *itch*...we are leaving here in less then 12 hours.....*yay*...the cars are already packed (ok, kind of packed)... and we have a ridiculusly huge amount of food... well.. at least we won't starve to death...*harhar*.

i cant wait till we get there... i mean... wow... but fist of, i dont know, if i'll survive that long long car ride... 8aaah*.... over 10 hours!!!! sweet jesus...but i guess ill survive that as well... *lol* i mean.. i have to...

ok... im defenitely in a totally "bla-mood"... i better stop now... or not?!
i just cant help it... im full of energy...*hihi*...oh by the way... i had like a really really good capuccino french vanilla last night...*yummy*...

~
nadin

*yay*... finally im done... i had the pleasure to clean out the whole garage with my "mom"...u wouldnt believe HOW MANY spiders and spiderwebs i found...and not that im afraid of spiders... BUT they r pretty grouse.

now im just enjoying myself *haha*... and the cat (name: target...like the store *lol*) is chilling in the swinging chair next to me... i might go and see shrek 2 tonight... should be fun... BUT wait... tonight is also the last episode of THE SOPRANOS (at least the last of that series...)on... hmmm... thats gonna be a tough choice... and i saw harry potter on friday. ok, if u dont like harry potter, just skip the next line(s)... it was awesome :)... i loved it... and i think, that it was better than the 1st and 2nd movie...(just like the books...).

two more days and we (friends + i) leave here to go down to tennessee...bonnaroo we r coming...*yay*. im excited... well... and whenever we come back at the 14th... my "real" parents r gonna be here. and the sad end of my time is near!!! *aaah* we leave here the 16th of JUNE...to go on vacation to mexico(what should be pretty cool... but still... i wanna stay longer...)

~
nadin

...i couldnt write in here the last few days... :/...  but our so GOOD workling computer decided again to break down... but here i am again..

today one of my friends gave me a litte "good bye" party... was defenitely a lot of fun...later on Holly came to pick me up ... we wanted to go to see some guy from our school playing... well... i guess we expected a little bit too much... first of... we were sitting infront of the building. and there were like girls comin in...*cough*...we thought we missed something... like "tonight is !@#$#-night... oh well...i guess we hoped for some NOT covered songs... but actually... what did we expect? a group of sophm. playing best rock...*think*... nope...so we turned the whole thing in some kinda "comedy show" that we were visiting...*lol*. quite amusing...:)
afterwards (we left early...*giggle*), we had to stop by at sheetz really really bad... i mean...we like really hat no way around stopping there.... we NEEDED ice cream...*yummy*...frozen yoghurt - cherry garcia and fudge fish is just too good for NOT eating... *lol*...at least not at 10:50 pm... right? 

~
nadin

well... i finally found out... there is NO way im going to heaven... pretty sad and depressing i gues.. *lol*.. BUT that very serious test here has proven it to me... im a very bad person... u guys better keep ur distance to me... *harhar* The Dante's Inferno Test has banished you to the Eigth Level of Hell - the Malebolge!
Here is how you matched up against all the levels:
LevelScore
Purgatory (Repenting Believers)Moderate
Level 1 - Limbo (Virtuous Non-Believers)Very Low
Level 2 (Lustful)Moderate
Level 3 (Gluttonous)Moderate
Level 4 (Prodigal and Avaricious)Moderate

Level 6 - The City of Dis (Heretics)Very Low
Level 7 (Violent)Low
Level 8- the Malebolge (Fraudulent, Malicious, Panderers)High

Take the Dante's Inferno Hell Test

ok... its probablly not too amazing... BUT im pround of myself.... i just figured out HOW to fix that problem i had with my journal calendar...*yay*... NOW all the entries are in the right order...:)

~
nadin

u wont believe how much i suffered the last few days....lol.
my computer was almost dead and we had to bring it to some computer-reparing guy.... so i had no compouter for a whole week... *scream*... and the thing was... i walked into that room here at least 5 times a day... just to realize again(!!!) that there was no computer... however it is back now... and WORK...wow.
i had (even without the computer*lol*)some pretty good days. its just... SUMMER :).
but all the fun is kinda overshadowed by my coming up depature here... :(. IM NOT READY TO LEAVE YET!!! but how cares about what i want...hmmm....ok that was kinda dramatic now... :)

i had probably one of the most delicious ice cream chuncies sunday night... *yummy*!!!... or what is better than choc.ice cream (a lot !!!) with cookie dough and oreo cookie topping, ...oh and whipped cream and one of these cherries... *smile*... ok everybody is gonna thing now... wow...she's gonna be fat...:/ ... nevermind...lol

ok.. i gtg now.... before i end up writing more and more weird things in here... *hehehe*

~ nadin

god...damn it...sorry....
but im like so stupid... somehow i screwed up the timer/date at our computer... i just realized that... and all my "older" journal entries are dated for the wrong month...(june instead of may!!!)...and know... that i changed it back, all my NEW ENTRIES are below/between my old ones... *argh*... i hope u guys are smarter than i am and able to "find" the newer ones... 

... how frustrating...

and i have to get up early tomorrow... i so f@#%ing mad right now... i better stop

~nadin

... that was defenitely a very long weekend... *yay*... my "brother" had graduation on Friday.. i was already sooo tired because of a party the night before... and after the whole ceremony... we just went right to the next party...-> another unhealty night...
saturday... of course... EVERYBODY has to have a grad party the next day... so we race(!!!) to... 5 or 6 (!) parties ... and im pretty close to fall assleep while im talking to all these people (dont ask for any names...*lol*)...after the 4th party i already felt like im gonna explode... i ate so much.. wow...of coures i didnt get a lot of sleep that night either...the result was, that my sunday was anything but productive or active....well.. ok i went to the Y!

... and today it's monday... i survived that whole grad-weekend... BUT mine is just coming up NOW!! sweet jesus...more sleepless nights and what so ever...

~.

nadin

wow... its amazing HOW much one person can actually change your mood... or cheer u up even more...wow...

my day just got even better... *smile*...

....my second day of summer... well... it kinda seems that summer decidet to leave us for a few days... its still warm.. ok almost hot... but no sun :(...instead humit...

my hopes to get some more sleep...all destroyed...arent nights there to have fun? lol... but parents/adults/grown ups (*lol*) dont seem to share the opinion that sleeping till noon is a very good plan.

tonight is my "brothers" Graduation what means there r gonna be like 1000s of parties this weekend... and mine is at the 26th. Yesterday we ran around in the house... with our caps on... they look so stupid *hahaha*...and my cap and gown are BABY BLUE... gosh... thats like the worst color ever... 

~nadin

*scream*

it's over. finito. zu ende. ...
today was the last day of my time in american high school....weird. hmmm... i had like 2 final exams...art (hey, dont laugh...was like history stuff) and calculus...
however... somehow... dont ask... i kinda fell asleep during both of them... maybe the huge lack of sleep is the reason for that?! *lol*....during lunch all(ok, almost all) the seniors went kinda nuts. running around, taking pictures with and everybody, being sad and excited at a time (you know that weird feeling of being pushed back and forward between happyness and total sadness?!!)...and i was actually "pround" of myself, that i wasnt crying or anything... well... whenever i walked to my next class i met some of my friends... and when they told me not to leave here, staying with them etc. finally my "wall of happyness" totally colapsed!!! [....]


and now summer time starts... *yey*...what means, sleeping in, going out(side), freetime...

maybe i'll get some more sleep...

tomorrow is my last day of school... well, my last day of school here( Here= West Virginia, USA....)and i'll be graduating soon...AND the end of my year in the States comes closer and closer... :(
(...i spend a year in the usa as an exchange student...i know, i never ever told u guys anything about myself...).

Y does time always goes by so fast...WHENEVER WE HAVE FUN?!!!?? 

and then i have like less than a month before i have to say goodbye to everyone...and for what? 2 more freakin years of school back in Germany.... isnt that great?! just because they dont wanna count my year here "over there"... *argh*
... but i guess i'll have to live with that... however... i dont want to go. isnt it somehow possible to split yourself in half? would be awesome...and solve all my "problems"...
